mapper.select:
SELECT qna_no as qnaNo, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_image as qnaImage, qna_datetime as qnaDatetime, count(qna_no) as replyCnt, user.name FROM qna LEFT JOIN reply ON qna.qna_no = reply.reply_qna_no INNER JOIN user ON qna.qna_user_no = user.user_no WHERE 1=1
and qna_title like concat('%', #{word},'%')
and qna_content like concat('%', #{word},'%')
GROUP BY qnaNo;
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_title, qna_content, qna_image, qna_user_no) values(#{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaImage}, #{qnaUserNo})
mapper.select: SELECT qna_user_no as qnaUserNo, qna_no as qnaNo, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_image as qnaImage, qna_datetime as qnaDatetime, name FROM qna, user WHERE qna.qna_no = #{no} AND qna.qna_user_no = user.user_no;

SELECT reply_qna_user_no as replyQnaUserNo, reply_no as replyNo, reply_content as replyContent, reply_datetime as replyDatetime, name, id from qna, reply, user where qna.qna_no = reply.reply_qna_no and reply.reply_qna_user_no = user.user_no and qna.qna_no = #{no};
